document_title: Benign goiter: Causes, diagnosis, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Depending on the cause of benign goiter, doctors prescribe different treatments. Normally, with small goiters, normal thyroid function, no choking, difficulty breathing, etc., they will be monitored and examined periodically without treatment. As for large goiters, affecting thyroid function, causing difficulty swallowing, breathing... depending on the disease condition, the doctor of the Department of Endocrinology - Diabetes will prescribe medication (internal treatment), radiotherapy, surgery.
subsection_title: buou co lanh tinh.json. Treatment of benign goiter
subsection_data:
buou co lanh tinh.json. Treatment of benign goiter
Depending on the cause of benign goiter, doctors prescribe different treatments. Normally, with small goiters, normal thyroid function, no choking, difficulty breathing, etc., they will be monitored and examined periodically without treatment. As for large goiters, affecting thyroid function, causing difficulty swallowing, breathing... depending on the disease condition, the doctor of the Department of Endocrinology - Diabetes will prescribe medication (internal treatment), radiotherapy, surgery.
